Description:
Introducing our durable shockproof handle case, specially designed to keep your device safe and secure. Made from high-quality, non-toxic EVA material, this case offers unbeatable protection for your valuable technology. Here's why it's a must-have:

  • Accessible Design: Includes designated slots for your charger, camera, earphones, and more, all without the hassle of removing the case.

Ideal for kids and children, our shockproof handle case combines reliability with practicality, providing worry-free usage for both parents and young users.

Product Name: Cat 7 Ethernet Cable ideal for gaming
Description:
Achieve High perfomance with Cat 7 Ethernet Cable. Flat design and special surface braided nylon provide double protection and heavy duty, make the Ethernet cable easy to pass trough the door or carpet. SHIELDED FROM INTERFERENCE: Made of 4 shielded twisted pair (STP) of copper wires with two RJ45 connectors on each end. Compared to the Cat 6 network Ethernet cable, the additional shielding and improved quality in twisting of the wires provides better protection from crosstalk, noise, and interference that can degrade the signal quality.

Data Transfer Rate: 10 Gigabits Per Second

Product Name: Ultra-Slim Shield Case - iPad Air 13" M2 & M3
Description: The Ultra-Slim Shield Case is precision-engineered to provide maximum protection with minimal bulk at just 17mm thick. Its lightweight, form-fitting design shields your iPad Air 13" M2 & M3 from scratches and bumps without compromising style or portability.

Product Name: Ultra-Slim Shield Case with Shoulder and Hand Strap with Built-In Screen Protector - iPad 11" 11th Gen
Description: The Ultra-Slim Shield Case is precision-engineered to provide maximum protection with minimal bulk at just 17mm thick. Its lightweight, form-fitting design shields your iPad 11th Gen from scratches and bumps without compromising style or portability.

Product Name: Shoulder and Hand Strap Case - iPad 10.2 7-9th Gen
Description:
The rugged case for the iPad 10.2 delivers a complete protection system without adding unnecessary bulk or weight. The perfect accompaniment to the iPad when being used in a business environment such as retail, queue busting, hospitality, healthcare, quality assurance and compliance, and more. The inner polycarbonate protective shell is remarkably strong, and locks the iPad in place with a latch that can be further secured with a Kensington lock if required. The thick, outer silicon wrap dissipates impact energy across a wide area, while innovative corner bumpers protect the iPad if it's dropped, screen down. Our ergonomically designed, ballistic Nylon hand strap reduces fatigue when used for extended use in landscape or portrait orientation.
Adjustable hand and shoulder strap system
Cut-outs for charge port, camera, and speakers
Integrated kick-stand
Thickened round corners for shatter-resistance and shock-absorption.

Description:
The rugged case for the new Samsung Tab A9 delivers a complete protection system without adding unnecessary bulk or weight. The perfect accompaniment to the tablet when being used in a business environment such as retail, queue busting, hospitality, healthcare etc.

• Remarkably strong inner polycarbonate protective shell

• Latch Samsung in for secure holding

• Thick outer silicon wrap dissipates impact energy

• Innovative corner bumpers protect Samsung if it's dropped screen down

• Ergonomically designed ballistic Nylon hand strap reduces fatigue

• Cut-outs for charge port, camera, and speakers

Product Name: Bluetooth Keyboard with Leather Folio for iPad 10.2 7-9th Gen
Description:
• Crafted from premium composition leather, our cover and shockproof case shield your tablet from accidental drops and bumps. The soft anti-slip interior ensures your tablet remains scratch-free.
  • Versatile Viewing Options: Enjoy three adjustable stand angles tailored for typing, viewing, and sketching, offering limitless possibilities for your tasks.
  • Convenient Keyboard Attachment: The slim and lightweight keyboard seamlessly attaches to the case magnetically, providing easy detachment when needed.
  • Keyboard charges with supplied USB cable
  • Automatic Sleep/Wake Feature: Experience the convenience of auto Sleep/Wake functionality (compatible only when the keyboard is detached), enhancing your device's efficiency.
  • Seamless Accessibility: Precise cutouts enable full access to all features, ensuring a hassle-free user experience.

Product Name: Clear Defender phone case - Samsung A05
Description:
Clear Defender Case – Samsung Galaxy A05 (Two-Piece Transparent Cover)
Shield your Samsung Galaxy A05 with this sleek, two-piece clear Defender case. Featuring a transparent back panel and raised edges on both front and rear for rugged, 360° protection, it guards against drops, scratches, and everyday wear without obscuring your phone’s design.

  • Front frame plus back panel: shockproof build for full coverage

  • Raised lips: added safeguard for screen and camera lenses

  • Precision cutouts: seamless access to buttons, ports, and ports

  • Crystal clear: preserves original device aesthetics

  • Compatibility: designed specifically for Galaxy A05 (not A05S)

Ideal For: Everyday users who want a dependable, minimalist case offering full protection while showcasing their phone’s original design. Perfect for NZ buyers seeking a ruggedly transparent case at great value.

Enhance your Samsung Galaxy S21 with our Gel Clear Case, designed to provide robust protection while maintaining your phone's sleek and modern look.

Key Features:

  • Material: Made from high-quality TPU (thermoplastic polyurethane), this case offers superior shock absorption and protection against scratches.

This elegant, transparent case is ideal for those who want durable protection without compromising on style.

Product Name: 2m Lightning to USB-A Right Angled (MFI Approved) - Black
Description: The right-angled connector is smaller than your standard iPad lightning connector, meaning less wear and tear for the cable once placed inside its case. Produced under Apples MFi licensing program, this cable is durable and quality certified.

Product Name: 2m Lightning to USB-C Right Angled (MFI Approved) - Black
Description: Produced under Apple's MFi licensing program, this cable is durable and quality certified. Specifically designed for optimum fit within iPad enclosures. Connector 1: Right Angled MFi Lightning Connector 2: Straight USB-C 2.0 AWG Power: 22AWG AWG Data: 30AWG Max. Power: 18W Transfer Speed: 480Mbps Packaged Size: 20 x 165 x 165 mm Weight: 0.06kg

The 2m USB-C to USB-A cable has been specifically designed for optimum fit inside iPad enclosures. This can be purchased individually, or added at checkout with compatible products. Compatible with all Samsung tablets that feature a USB-C charging port (not compatible with the latest generation of Apple iPad Pro). Connector 1: Right Angled USB-C 2.0 Connector 2: Straight USB-A 2.0 AWG Power: 21 AWG Data: 30 Max. Power: 5V/2.4A< Transfer Speed: 480MB/sec max Packaged Size: 20 x 130 x 210 mm

The 2m USB-C to USB-C cable has been specifically designed for optimum fit inside Bouncepad and Tab-Secure cases. This can be purchased individually, or added at checkout with compatible products. Compatible with all the latest generation of Apple iPad Pro tablets that feature a USB-C charging port (not compatible with Samsung tablets with USB-C port). Connector 1: Right Angled USB-C 2.0 Connector 2: Straight USB-C 2.0 AWG Power: 21 AWG Data: 30 Max. Power: 20V/3A + PD Charging Transfer Speed: 480MB/sec max Packaged Size: 20 x 130 x 210 mm

Product Name: Reinforced 2m USB-C to USB-A Charge Cable
Description: The 2 metre reinforced USB charging cable ensures your tablets are secured, tethered and always charging. The USB cable is enclosed in a flexible nylon mesh alongside strong steel rope which secures to the inside of the Bouncepad case. Great for portability, simply tether to your Bouncepad and a fixed point for use in a versatile range of environments. The enclosed right-angled USB-C to USB-A Sync and Charge cable has been specifically designed for optimum fit within Bouncepad products. Perfectly suited to secure the freestanding Counter, Counter 60, Counter Flex and Flip tablet enclosures. Compatible with all Samsung tablets that feature a USB-C charging port with USB-A end. Reinforced with a 2mm galvanised steel wire wrapped and sealed in a white plastic braid. Connector 1: Right Angled USB-C 2.0 Connector 2: Straight USB-A 2.0 AWG Power: 21 AWG Data: 30 Max. Power: 5V/2.4A Transfer Speed: 480MB/sec max Packaged Size: 20 x 130 x 210 mm

The Bouncepad Click is our universal tablet and iPad stand and docking station, offering a superb and stylish way to display and secure your tablet or iPad without compromising on portability. Perfect for point of sale (POS) or front of house.

• Tablet clicks in place and undocks with the press of a button.

• Lock your tablet or iPad in place with the lock and key system.

• Smoothly rotates 340°

• Tablet or iPad can be docked in Landscape or portrait.

• Micro-suction base, so your Click doesn’t budge, without the need for drilling holes in your countertop.

Pair Click with Caddy for a seamless and elegant POS solution.

Lock down Click with its lock and key system to disable the quick release button, securing your tablet or iPad in place.

The Bouncepad Wall Mount – Core Branch provides a universal solution for securely displaying tablets in customer-facing or operational environments. With its sleek, modern design, this mount ensures that your tablet remains protected and fully accessible, making it ideal for retail, hospitality, and corporate spaces.

Key Features:

  • Universal Compatibility: Designed to support any tablet using USB-C, ensuring flexibility for various devices, including the latest iPad models.
  • Durable Construction: Built with high-quality materials, offering stability and security to prevent theft and damage.
  • Easy Accessibility: Provides full access to tablet buttons and charging ports, ensuring continuous usage without obstruction.
  • Cable Management: Internal cable routing keeps wires neat and out of sight, ensuring a clean, clutter-free installation.

The Core Branch elegantly extends from vertical surfaces at a 30° angle perfect for interactive display applications

The Bouncepad Core Counter 60 is a secure and ergonomic tablet stand, designed for easy interaction when placed on bar-height counters, tables, or desks. Its freestanding design offers stability without the need for permanent fixtures, making it ideal for environments where drilling is not possible.

Key Features:

  • Freestanding Stability: The weighted solid steel base provides a stable yet portable solution, perfect for counters where drilling is not an option.
  • Universal Compatibility: Suited for all USB-C tablets, from the iPad Mini to the iPad Pro, allowing for versatile applications.
  • Flexible Display Options: Easily switch between portrait and landscape orientations to display content in the most effective format.
  • Durable Construction: Built with die-cast aluminium and hard-wearing powder-coated finishes, the stand is designed for long-term use in high-traffic environments.
  • Secure Mounting: The large 3M adhesive pad secures your tablet, while the integrated cable grip prevents power cable removal, ensuring continuous charging during use.
  • Enhanced Security: For added peace of mind, purchase the reinforced cable (sold separately) to tether the stand and keep your tablet safe.
  • Sleek Aesthetic: The Core Range mounting system displays your tablet with a minimal, modern look that fits seamlessly into any environment.

The Bouncepad Core Counter 60 is an excellent solution for secure, stylish tablet displays in environments like retail, hospitality, and visitor registration.

Eddy is our premium stand for style-conscious customers. The rotating base and tilting feature make it perfect for a range of users and counter heights. This stand features a freestanding base which provides the perfect amount of friction. It slides when it needs to slide but stays put when in use. Eddy's rotating base allows easy screen-sharing around 350 and a hinge which gives over 90 of screen angle adjustment. Fit your tablet in between Eddy's jaws and lock it into position using the Allen key provided. Once secured, your tablet won't budge.

Eddy and Caddy is a combo of two great products that work together to keep your POS counter space clutter-free. Eddy, our iPad Stand for POS, takes care of your tablet, it's adjustable, secure and manages the cable. Caddy is Eddy's little helper, managing peripheral devices like card readers and receipt printers, keeping their power cables tidy and concealed. Itâ€™s the perfect Tablet and iPad stand setup for retail and hospitality.

Designed to work with the Zoom Meeting Room Controller App; with a continuous power supply, neat cable management, security features and commercial-grade construction, Bouncepad Link is fit for purpose every step of the way. It is a beautifully designed product, certain to complement any office decor. Available in Black and White. Couple with a PoE Adaptor if you prefer a cabled connection instead of Wi-Fi.

The Brother Printer Mount Battery Add-On is a practical accessory designed to enhance the stability and functionality of your Brother label printer when using a battery pack. This add-on ensures better label catching and includes longer screws for secure mounting of both the printer and battery pack.

Key Features:

  • Improved Label Catching: Designed to optimise label handling when using a battery pack.
  • Secure Mounting: Includes longer screws to safely attach the Brother printer and battery pack.
  • Seamless Integration: Compatible with Bouncepad Brother Printer Mounts for a tidy, professional setup.
  • Enhanced Convenience: Ensures a stable and efficient printing experience in mobile and fixed workstation environments.

Applications:

Ideal for businesses and retail environments that use Brother label printers with battery packs, ensuring smooth operation and secure mounting.

Tools Required:
Socket Driver
10mm Spanner *or adjustable spanner

Product Name: Bouncepad Wing - iPad Air 13.0 M2 & M3
Description: The Bouncepad Wing for iPad Air 13.0 M2 & M3 in white is a secure and elegant iPad floor stand. The streamlined design and full metal construction commands attention while keeping your iPad safe, secure and powered. It’s the ultimate iPad floor stand that presents your content in style. With various branding, security and power options the Bouncepad Wing is suitable for a variety of environments and use cases. Although we think it’s particularly perfect for events and trade shows!

Product Name: Wing Magnetic Branding Panel in Landscape - iPad Air 13.0 M2 & M3
Description:
Accessorise your Bouncepad Wing - iPad Air 13.0 M2 & M3 Kiosk with boldly designed Branding Panels that will give your customers a visual cue and ensure you get noticed from a distance. These panels are 1mm magnetic sheets and can be printed in full colour and incredible detail. The finish is hard wearing so it will be sure to handle the demands of day to day use.

Following receipt of your order we will provide an Adobe Illustrator template that you will need to add your artwork to. Delivery time of your order will be 15-20 working days from confirmation of your artwork.

Enhance the security of your Bouncepad Wing with this durable lock and key set. Designed for quick and easy installation, it provides an added layer of protection for your tablet displays, ensuring peace of mind in public spaces.

Product Name: Phantom Media Player - 4K 60fps Solid State Fanless Box-PC, Dual Band WiFi, Android 12, Ultra Compact
Description:
Phantom BXP-100 Ultra Compact 4K Digital Signage Player

Elevate your signage to new heights with the Phantom BXP-100 4K Digital Signage Player.

With stunning 4K resolution, the Phantom delivers vivid colour displays and the best graphics, ensuring your content is delivered without missing a beat. Take your business signage to the next level today and invest in Phantom BXP-100. You won’t be disappointed.

Make Your Signage Pop with Phantom BXP-100 4K Digital Signage

Designed to make your visuals pop, this AV hardware delivers colour-rich 4:2:0 and 4K content that captures the eyes of your audience.

Features include:

  • 4K Ultra HD resolution at 60fps
  • Ultra compact size
  • Powerful ARM Quad Core 1.5GHz processor
  • Solid State Fanless Box-PC
  • Built for enterprise applications
  • Operating System: Android 10
  • Connectivity: 5G/2.4G Dual band Wi-Fi
  • 1 x HDMI Output
  • Memory: 2GB DDR4, with 32GB storage
  • Takes Micro USB and Micro SD cards
  • Includes a 2-year warranty for dependable operation.

Whether you choose landscape or portrait signage, the crisp and clear transmission ensures that your message stands out on any display size.

Stunning 4K Visuals and Performance

When it comes to performance and reliability, the Phantom BXP-100 sets a new standard in immersive visual displays. Made by Qbic, this Enterprise level Box-PC is by far the most compact and powerful in its class.

Built for demanding enterprise applications, it combines 4K resolution with unmatched graphics encoding quality. With 60fps, your content is delivered quickly and efficiently, creating a seamless viewing experience for your audience.

Order now and unleash the power of captivating visuals in a compact design. Browse our range of innovative solutions today to make a lasting impression with your clients.

Seamless Integration in Your Workplace

At Leading Solutions, we are your leading supplier of AV hardware solutions in New Zealand. We’ve got you covered with everything you need to ensure seamless integration of technology in your workplace.

Need help finding the right equipment to complete your set-up? Our knowledgeable team is here to guide you in choosing the perfect solution for your specific needs. For further tips and advice, contact us today.

Product Name: 4K Android Digital Signage Player with HDMI Output
Description:
Designed for streamlined deployment and crisp content delivery, the Compact 4K Android Digital Signage Player offers robust performance in a fanless, space-saving form. Powered by a high-efficiency Rockchip processor and running Android OS, it’s perfect for powering single or dual display signage setups in retail, hospitality, and corporate environments.

  • 4K HDMI Output – Delivers ultra-clear content via HDMI 2.0, perfect for modern displays.

  • Fanless Aluminium Chassis – Durable, quiet, and thermally efficient for 24/7 reliability.

  • Android OS with OTA Support – Easily manage and update content remotely with over-the-air updates.

  • VESA Mountable Design – Slim and secure for discreet behind-the-screen installation.

  • Gigabit LAN + Wi-Fi Connectivity – Seamless online access for cloud CMS platforms.

Why it Stands Out:
This signage player balances compact design with performance, offering true 4K resolution, flexible mounting, and enterprise-ready connectivity for digital signage networks of any scale.

Applications:
Perfect for retail advertising, hotel lobbies, interactive kiosks, menu boards, and real-time information displays across public spaces.

Discover the future of visual displays with the BXP-350, an advanced 8K digital signage player from Qbic Technology. Designed to meet the rigorous demands of modern digital displays, this device boasts crystal-clear 8K video playback at 60fps, ensuring that each frame is rendered with stunning detail. Perfect for dynamic environments needing reliable, high-resolution signage solutions.

Key Features:

  • 8K Video Support: Enjoy unparalleled clarity with 8K/60fps video playback.
  • Extensive Connectivity: Features a comprehensive range of I/O ports for maximum flexibility.
  • Robust System: Powered by an ARM Quad-Core CPU, with 8GB RAM and 128GB storage.
  • Durable and Reliable: Metal casing with a wide operating temperature range, ideal for challenging conditions.
  • Versatile Installation: VESA-compatible mounting options.
  • Warranty: Includes a 2-year warranty for dependable operation.

Ideal for venues that demand high-end, reliable digital signage capable of handling detailed, high-resolution content effortlessly.

Sharp 4K UHD Overhead Video

Lumens CL511 can be suspended from, or embedded into the ceiling. It provides presenters an unobstructed top view of a table top, podium, or demonstration area. The camera can shoot documents or objects larger than A0 size (over 88" x 48" / 2.2m x 1.2m) at up to 4K resolution.

Accurate Positioning

The CL511 can project mark the middle of the shooting area with a targeting laser, making it quick and easy to position objects accurately in the center of the frame. With 300x close-up capabilities, the camera is ready to capture the finest details.

Step-Up Onboard Collaboration

The CL511 supports a wireless mouse to access onboard collaboration tools for spotlighting a particular area. It also enables free drawing without a PC or any software. The addition of Lumens Ladibug program gives users access to advanced features such as text overlay, 4K recording, and use with a touch panel.

Fast & Easy Installation

Featuring HDMI, USB, VGA, and Ethernet video outputs, users can output to video conferencing platforms, projectors and large format displays, and devices connected to the local network.
The CL511 also supports Power over Ethernet (PoE+). Using a standard network cable, the visualizer can be operated without additional power supplies. These features significantly reduce installation time and costs.

Product Name: 10Gbps Gen2 Type-C USB 3.1 Male To USB-C Female Extension Data 100W Charging Right Angled Extender Cord Reversible Design
Description:
Engineered for high-performance applications, this USB-C extension cable delivers ultra-fast data transfer, robust charging, and crystal-clear video output. Supporting up to 5A current with 100W Power Delivery (PD), it is designed to charge even power-hungry laptops and devices at lightning speed. The embedded E-Marker chip ensures safe and efficient power negotiation, while the durable braided construction and gold-plated connectors enhance longevity and reliability.

Key Features:

  • 100W PD Fast Charging: Supports up to 5A current, making it ideal for charging laptops, tablets, and high-power devices quickly and efficiently.
  • High-Speed Data: USB 3.1 Gen 2 speeds up to 10Gbps for fast file transfers and smooth workflows.
  • 4K Video Output: Seamlessly connects devices to 4K monitors and projectors for high-definition visuals.
  • E-Marker Technology: Ensures safe, optimised charging and data transfer for compatible devices.
  • Premium Durability: Braided nylon jacket and gold-plated connectors resist wear and tear.
  • Universal Compatibility: Works with laptops, smartphones, gaming devices, and other USB-C peripherals.

Why 5A and 100W PD Matter:
 The 5A current capability, combined with 100W Power Delivery, allows this cable to power devices like laptops and monitors significantly faster than standard USB cables. With this feature, users save time while ensuring devices charge safely without overheating or damaging the battery, making it perfect for professionals and tech enthusiasts alike.

Applications:
 Ideal for charging laptops and gaming consoles, powering monitors, transferring large files quickly, and connecting to high-resolution displays in professional or personal settings.

Product Name: USB-C 240W Power Delivery Adapter – USB4, PD 3.1, 8K Video Support
Description:
Powerful, Fast Charging & Ultra-High-Speed Data for Modern USB-C Devices

The USB-C 240W Power Delivery Adapter delivers up to 240 watts of fast, efficient power using the latest USB Power Delivery 3.1 protocol. Designed for high-performance laptops, gaming consoles, and USB-C hubs, it ensures your devices get the power they need—quickly and safely.

With support for USB4 and 40Gbps data transmission, this adapter provides blazing-fast data transfer alongside reliable charging. It also supports 8K video output via DisplayPort Alt Mode, making it ideal for creators, gamers, and professionals requiring ultra-high-definition displays.

Built with durable PC fireproof material, it offers enhanced safety and reliability for home, office, or travel use.

  • Up to 240W power delivery with USB PD 3.1 for fast, safe charging

  • USB4 support enables 40Gbps data transfer speeds

  • Supports 8K video output for ultra-high-definition displays

  • Constructed with PC fireproof material for durability and safety

  • Compatible with modern USB-C laptops, tablets, gaming consoles, and peripherals

  • Compact, lightweight design perfect for travel and desktop use

  • Advanced safety protections: overcurrent, overvoltage, short circuit, and overtemperature

This adapter is a versatile, powerful solution built for today’s demanding devices—delivering fast charging, high-speed data, and stunning 8K video support in one compact package.

Product Name: USB-C to RJ45 Gigabit Ethernet Adapter
Description:
Fast, Stable Wired Network Access for USB-C Devices

This USB-C to Gigabit Ethernet Adapter delivers high-speed, reliable wired internet access—perfect for modern phones, laptops, tablets, and gaming consoles that lack built-in Ethernet ports.

Supporting full Gigabit Ethernet speeds (10/100/1000 Mbps), it ensures smooth streaming, fast downloads, and responsive online gaming. With broad operating system compatibility—including Windows, macOS, ChromeOS, and Linux—it offers plug-and-play convenience on most devices without the need for additional drivers.

  • Gigabit Ethernet (10/100/1000 Mbps) for high-performance networking

  • Plug-and-play on most OS – no driver installation needed in most cases

  • Compact and lightweight – ideal for mobile setups and travel

  • USB-C interface – perfect for modern devices like MacBook, Surface, Chromebook, and Steam Deck

  • Great for gaming – reduces latency and avoids Wi-Fi dropouts

  • LED indicators for connection and speed status

  • Wake-on-LAN, flow control, and full duplex support for business users

Whether you're working from home, gaming competitively, or managing a hybrid office setup, this compact and durable adapter provides a dependable network connection wherever you go.

Product Name: 100W GaN Fast Charge QuadPort USB-C PD 3.0 Charger - 3x USB-C & 1x USB-A
Description:
Power up all your devices efficiently with the 100W GaN Fast Charge QuadPort Charger, featuring advanced gallium nitride (GaN) technology for compact, cool, and reliable performance. With three USB-C PD 3.0 ports and one USB-A Quick Charge port, it intelligently distributes power for fast, safe, and simultaneous charging across multiple devices.

Built-in protection safeguards against over-voltage, over-current, and short circuits, while its lightweight, space-saving design makes it ideal for desks or travel.

  • Total Output: Up to 100W across 4 ports

  • Ports: 3 × USB-C PD 3.0 + 1 × USB-A QC

  • Smart Power Distribution: Dynamically allocates charging power per device

  • GaN Technology: Faster charging, better heat efficiency

  • Protection: Over-voltage, over-current, short-circuit

  • Compatibility: MacBook, Dell XPS, iPad Pro, iPhone 15, Samsung Galaxy, tablets & accessories

Perfect for offices, home setups, or travel—this all-in-one charger replaces multiple adapters with a single high-performance power solution.

Product Name: 188W GaN Fast Charge MultiPort USB-C PD 3.1 Charger - 3x USB-C & 2x USB-A
Description:
Power multiple devices efficiently with the 188W GaN Fast Charge MultiPort Charger, featuring advanced gallium nitride (GaN) technology for compact, cool, and reliable performance. With three USB-C PD 3.1 ports and two USB-A Quick Charge ports, it intelligently distributes power for fast, safe, and simultaneous charging.

Total Output: Up to 188W across 5 ports

Ports: 3 × USB-C PD 3.1 + 2 × USB-A QC

Smart Power Distribution: Dynamically allocates charging power per device

GaN Technology: Faster charging with reduced heat

Protection: Over-voltage, over-current, short-circuit

Compatibility: MacBook Pro, Dell XPS, iPad Pro, iPhone, Samsung Galaxy, tablets & USB-powered devices

Perfect for home, office, or travel, this multi-port charger replaces several adapters with a single high-performance charging hub.

Product Name: 30W GaN Fast Charge Dual Port USB-C PD 3.0 Charger - USB-C & USB-A
Description:
Charge your devices quickly and safely with the 30W GaN Fast Charge Dual Port Charger, featuring advanced gallium nitride (GaN) technology for compact, cool, and reliable performance. Equipped with one USB-C PD 3.0 port and one USB-A Quick Charge 3.0 port, it intelligently distributes power for fast, simultaneous charging.

Total Output: Up to 30W

Ports: 1 × USB-C PD 3.0 + 1 × USB-A QC 3.0

Smart Power Distribution: Delivers optimal charging per device

GaN Technology: Efficient heat dissipation and faster charging

Protection: Over-voltage, over-current, over-temperature, short-circuit

Compatibility: iPhone, Samsung Galaxy, iPad, tablets & USB-C devices

Ideal for home, office, or travel, this compact charger powers multiple devices safely and efficiently with a single AU/NZ plug.

Product Name: Grip & Dock - Universal Secure Stand and Hand Grip
Description:
Secure your mobile workforce with this universal tablet hand grip and lockable stand that allows you to 'grab and go' with your iPad and safely display it when stationary. The ergonomically designed Hand Grip has an adjustable strap and 360-degree tablet rotation. Complete with a secure display docking stand featuring our quick lock design, it provides you a clean way to store your iPad Hand Grip between uses or even as a point of sale or retail kiosk.

Grip and Dock Kit Includes:

Tablet Hand Grip

Quick-Lock/Unlock Docking Stand

Swivel Base Plate

Compulocks’ Universal Locking Rugged Case Holder with the swinging counter or wall mount is perfect for the mobile user and workforce. This best-selling Universal Security Cable Lock designed by Compulocks uses the security slot on laptops, monitors, iMacs, and other computers to protect from theft. The lock features a loop-ended cable made of galvanized steel. Simply loop the cable lock thorugh a stationary object, such as a desk or table, and connect your laptop, monitor, All in One PC.

The slim 't bar' style locking head is designed to fit the standard security slot found on PCs, and laptops.
 
Universal Security Cable Lock includes:
- 6ft security cable lock
- Set of 2 keys

The Cling 2.0 is a universal iPad Lock and Stand designed to work with all iPad models with just one device!Â This updated version is compatible with a variety of tablet models and sizes making it a near universal tablet security solution. Securing your tablet is a re-designed bracket clamp and stand base. The most notable update to the stand is now the mount base comes with 3M VHB adhesive as well as hidden screw holes. The Cling 2.0 bracket can still rotate between portrait and landscape mode and no more confusing setup, the entire unit comes ready to go out of the box!

The Coiled Cable Lock, is the perfect first line of defense against theft or unwanted borrowing. This best seller, secures all our enclosures and stands as well as thousands of computers, laptops and peripheral devices utilising a K-Slot security connection. Universal Coiled Cable lock is a loop-ended cable made of galvanized steel and is slimmer than standard cable locks. The locking head is a T-Bar design at a 90 degree angle with a rotating head and coiled cable for low-profile use keeping all excess cabling tightly wound. The cable can be looped around a stationary object, like a desk or table, or you can purchase an anchoring unit to create a secure point for tethering the cable to.

The HoverTab is a two part system, the first being an adhesive steel plate that connects to the back of the iPad, Galaxy Tab or smartphone. The 2024 Mac Mini Security Mount offers robust, sleek protection for your Mac Mini, securing it against theft while maintaining full access to all ports and functions. Crafted with durable materials, this mount is designed to safeguard your device in commercial and public environments, making it ideal for offices, retail, and educational settings. The mount features a lockable enclosure and includes a lock head, providing double-layered protection without compromising usability.

  • Fits All Models – Compatible with all Mac Minis including 2024 M4.

  • Flexible Mounting – VESA 75x75 & 100x100 for walls, desks, or under tables.

  • Ventilated Design – Prevents overheating and preserves Wi-Fi signal.

  • Full Access – All ports and buttons remain accessible.

  • Secure Enclosure – Built-in lock head provides strong physical security.

  • Quick Install – Slide-in design for easy setup.

This mount is perfect for securing Mac Minis in offices, retail spaces, educational institutions, and other public settings where device security is paramount.

The Mac Mini Mount is a high-grade aluminum VESA mount bracket, to secure and lock the Mac Mini to any flat surface. You can safely screw the Mac Mini mount to a wall, desk, underside of a table, and even the back of a monitor. Once the bracket is secured all you need to do is slide your Mac Mini into the mount and connect the lock. The ventilated design prevents the Mac Mini from overheating and from wireless signal loss, while enabling easy access to operate the device and reach the power button, USB, HDMI and Ethernet ports, ensuring there are no interruptions to the user experience. The Mac Mini Security Mount Kit Includes: Quality aluminum VESA Mount bracket, Lock for securing the bracket, Set of Keys
- Easy to install on a counter or wall- High-grade aluminum enclosure- Secured with keyed lock- Ventilated designed with cable management- 100mm x 100mm & 75mm x 75mm VESA Pattern

Product Name: Cling VESA Universal Tablet Wall Mount
Description: Cling Universal VESA Mount is designed to work with all iPad models and Tablets 7 - 13 screen size in just one device. Designed to fit a wide range of tablet sizes in the one bracket, Cling Mount can be fixed to a Wall or Counter, or combined with one of our VESA compatible Arms and Stands for additional functionality. Securing your tablet is a bracket clamp closed with concealed, tamper proof screws. The 100mm x 100mm VESA mount now includes cable management and hidden screw holes. The Cling Mount rotates between portrait and landscape mode and setup is quick and easy.

Product Name: Cling VESA Universal Tablet Wall Mount
Description: Cling Universal VESA Mount is designed to work with all iPad models and Tablets 7 - 13 screen size in just one device. Designed to fit a wide range of tablet sizes in the one bracket, Cling Mount can be fixed to a Wall or Counter, or combined with one of our VESA compatible Arms and Stands for additional functionality. Product Name: 4K Portable Document Camera with USB output
Description:
Excellent Image Quality

With a 13-megapixel Sony sensor, DC136 is a professional-quality visualizer which produces bright images and vivid colors. It supports capture and live reproduction at resolutions up-to 4K. Able to visualize the finest detail and even fast action, DC136 is great for use in education and training.  

User friendly Interface

Buttons on the base quickly control core functions including lamp on/off, image freeze and capture. Auto-tune and focus buttons automatically optimize the camera to produce sharp, color balanced and bright images that look great on 4K monitors, projectors, and large format displays.  

Lumens Ladibug Software

DC136 supports Lumens Ladibug 4K application. The software gives users access to advanced features which include annotating images, masking and cropping images, and sharing saved files. Ladibug is easy to use and is compatible with Windows and Mac computers.  

Audio and Video Recording

The built-in microphone can capture video with audio: it’s easy to record motion, complete with on-screen annotation and voice-over. This means that the device is convenient for collaborative training and distance learning. USB Plug & Play Set up couldn't be easier. The USB cable is connected to a computer (PC or Mac) without the need for an external power adapter or VGA cable. Using the Ladibug software, the computer can save videos locally or share files across networks. 

Ultimate Webcam

Featuring an UltraHD camera and professional microphone, Lumens DC136 works with Zoom, Teams, Skype and Webex platforms. Users can position the camera head over a document, angle it towards the presenter or focus on students to encourage group participation. As a UVC compliant device, there are no drivers to install or configuration required. It's fully plug and play.  

Imaging Flexibility

The 4K camera is mounted on a flexible, multi-angle gooseneck design. The height is adjustable for close-up or wide-angle imaging. The lens can capture large documents and objects, in excess of A3 in size (16.8” x 12.6”), giving the DC136 the versatility for use in any location and for a wide range of applications. For customers preferring an HD model, check out the DC125. 
  • UltraHD resolution output  
  • Portable, lightweight design with flexible gooseneck  
  • High-speed capture up-to 30fps  
  • Hands-free auto-focus and image optimization  
  • USB plug and play design  
  • Compatible with most whiteboards

Product Name: 4K Document Camera with USB/HDMI output - Red
Description:
Excellent Image Quality

DC172 is a professional-quality visualizer with a 13-megapixel Sony sensor which produces bright images and vivid colors. It supports capture and live reproduction at resolutions up-to 4K and visualizes the smallest detail and even fast action. DC172 is great for use in education, business presentations and training.

Standalone Solution

With our exclusive PC-free solution, users can annotate images and control menu settings by plugging simply a mouse into the unit. For ease of use, DC172 records images and video to a USB Flash drive (not supplied). These features make this document camera very portable and also quick to learn with no specialist skill required. 

HDMI Output & Pass-thru

DC172 builds on the USB-only DC136 to include an HDMI output for direct connection to displays and projectors. The auto-tune button automatically optimizes the camera to produce sharp, color balanced, and bright images that look great on 4K monitors, projectors, and large format displays. A unique feature is the HDMI pass-through: the operator can switch between the camera output an image from a DVD player, PC, or tablet.

Lumens Ladibug Software

If connected to a computer by USB, DC172 supports the Lumens Ladibug 4K application. This creative software gives users access to advanced features which include annotating images, masking and cropping images, and sharing saved files. Ladibug is easy to use and is compatible with Windows and Mac computers. USB Plug & Play set up could not be easier. Using the Ladibug software, the computer can save videos locally or share files across networks. 

Audio and Video Recording

Along with clear video recordings, the document camera's built-in microphone captures great-sounding audio. As a USB device with 4K camera and microphone, Lumens DC172 can also operate as a live webcam. It works seamlessly with Zoom, Teams, Skype, and WebEx platforms to provide an excellent video conferencing experience for remote guests. The presenters can position the camera head over a document, angle it towards themselves or focus on students to encourage group participation.  

Imaging Flexibility

The 4K camera is mounted on a flexible, multi-angle gooseneck design. The height is adjustable for close-up or wide-angle imaging. The lens can capture large documents and objects above A3 in size (16.5” x 12.4”), giving the DC172 the versatility for use in any location and for a wide range of applications. 
  • UltraHD resolution at 30fps 
  • HDMI and USB output  
  • Portable, lightweight design with flexible gooseneck  
  • Hands-free auto-focus and image optimization  
  • USB plug and play design 
  • Compatible with most whiteboards

Product Name: 20x Zoom Document Camera with VGA/HDMI Input and Output - Red
Description:
Excellent Image Quality

Lumens DC193 captures documents and 3D objects for live HD display on projectors and monitors. Featuring VGA and HDMI outputs, the visualizer supports resolutions up-to 1080 and produces sharp, vivid and bright images. With a built-in power adapter and onboard recording, DC193 can be used as a standalone document camera, without the need for a host computer or network connection. 

Expandable Media Storage

The DC193's internal image store can be expanded using a USB flash drive up-to a maximum 4TB. Files stored locally can be played out to screens, or shared with colleagues for playback on any computer or smart device.  

Standalone Creativity

Most document cameras require a PC for annotation and live graphic overlay. By connecting a USB mouse to the unit, users have access to a range of drawing, highlighting, and masking tools which will enhance any live presentation. 

Computer Integration

Connect DC193 to a PC via USB to enjoy even greater creativity. Lumens Ladibug software for PC and Mac brings advanced annotation tools to desktop computers. Users can add text, spotlight and erase regions of an image, and much more. Connecting the camera to a computer by USB also turns DC193 into a webcam, recognized by all major video conferencing software, such as Teams, Zoom, and Webex. The high-quality camera and in-built microphone combine to deliver a truly versatile collaborative communication tool.

Picture Perfect

With an adjustable lamp and the camera mounted on a flexible gooseneck, users can capture the image they want, without distracting reflections or uneven lighting. Once the camera and light are perfectly positioned, the one-click Auto-Tune button quickly adjusts the clarity, brightness, and color to produce great-looking pictures without any user input. 
  • 1080 output (30fps)  
  • Flexible gooseneck design 
  • VGA input/output, HDMI input/output 
  • Built-in microphone 
  • Internal recording with support for USB drive expansion 
  • Innovative built-in power supply

Product Name: Lumens DC-F20 HD/2K Foldaway Document Camera with USB output
Description:
• 2K / 1080p Full HD
  • USB Plug & Play
  • Electronic Pan, Tilt and Zoom up-to 16x Total Zoom (via Software)
  • > A3 Shooting Area
  • Built-in Microphone

    Grab & Go Design

    The foldable and lightweight design makes DC-F20 very easy to carry. A portable demonstration tool, it's perfect for teachers and business professionals.

    Superb Image Quality

    DC-F20 delivers vivid and colorful images. It is perfect for projection or product demonstrations with 1080p resolution and higher (up-to 2K).

    Dual Document Camera - Webcam Design

    Equipped with one-touch image rotation, DC-F20 simply flips from use as a document camera to a webcam. It's a great piece of technology for hybrid classrooms which combine in-class teaching with distance learning.

    Three-Level LED Lighting as Fill Light

    With a built-in light, DC-F20 can even be used in rooms with poor lighting. Adjust the level of lighting to illuminate documents or faces, when used as a webcam.

    Collaboration Tool for Windows, MAC, and Chrome

    Ladibug's creative tools elevate your presentation to engage more fully with students. The application runs on Windows, MacOS, and Chrome OS.

Product Name: 4K Folding Document Camera with USB/HDMI output
Description:
Versatile Imaging

The Lumens DC-F80 4K document camera is a high-performance, portable visualizer. It features a professional imaging sensor, 30x zoom, and HDMI output. Able to capture moving images with sound at 30fps, the DC-F80 is an excellent document camera. Supporting resolutions from XGA to UltraHD, the camera can be used as a visualizer, or webcam in USB mode. The flexible arm allows the presenter, lecturer, or teacher to both reproduce documents and interact with students (local and remote) all in the same session.

Easy to Use

Buttons on the unit give users instant access to key controls. These allow the user to rotate or flip the on-screen image, adjust the brightness, and freeze the picture on screen. The camera can zoom in an out on any part of the document using the navigation keys, giving the demonstrator excellent control over the presentation. 

Interactive Presentations

With the DC-F80 connected by USB to your PC, Mac, users can manage all the camera's settings and control the device from their computer. By installing the Lumens Ladibug software, users can access advanced features which include annotating, masking and cropping images, and sharing saved files. Ladibug software is easy to use and is a fantastic way of bringing real-time demonstrations to life.

Excellent Image Control

DC-F80 enables presenters to demonstrate detailed images of any objects in real-time. The flexibility of the mount means that the camera can be positioned close to a document, or focus on an object at an angle. The auto-tune button automatically optimizes the camera to produce sharp, color balanced, and bright images that look great on computer monitors, projectors, and large format displays.  

USB Connectivity

When connected by USB, the Lumens DC-F80 is automatically recognized by all popular video conferencing software. The built-in microphone makes it a complete audio-visual device that can be at the heart of your Zoom, Teams, Skype, or WebEx sessions.
  • UltraHD visualizer with HDMI output 
  • Plug and play webcam mode 
  • A3+ shooting area 
  • LED light with three brightness levels

Promising ease of installation, this stand offers a wide range of benefits for your business. Check out our stylish range today.

Acadia Large Fixed Height Wall Stand for 30"-55" TV

Acadia Large Fixed Height Wall Stand provides a revolutionary solution for mounting your screens and other AV displays. Its sleek, stylish design will blend seamlessly into your environment so that the focus is always on your display.

Designed with convenience and simplicity in mind, this wall stand offers a hassle-free installation process with no drilling required. Using a stabilizing pad and 3-point geometry support, the stand offers a way to mount screens to the wall while being able to withstand everyday knocks.

Browse our range of stands today to make a memorable impression with your clients.

Impress Your Clients with Style and Innovation

The Acadia Large Fixed Height Wall Stand allows you to adjust the height of the screen by 200mm so you can find the perfect viewing position. With five positions to choose from, you can easily customize the height to suit your preferences and optimize your viewing experience.

The repositionable stabilizing pad made of elastomer provides stability and prevents any wobbling or shifting of the screen. An anti-fall device ensures the safety of your screen, giving you peace of mind. Additionally, the stand can be painted to seamlessly blend with your decor, creating a cohesive and professional look.

AV Solutions You Can Trust

Product Name: Acadia X-Large 600 Wall Stand for 40"-75" TV
Description:
This No-Drill TV Wall Mount offers an innovative, drill-free solution for mounting your TV, ideal for those seeking a hassle-free installation without damaging walls. Designed for LED, LCD, and plasma screens from 40" to 75", this mount supports up to 45 kg, making it perfect for modern living rooms, rental spaces, or offices.

Key Features:

  • Screen Compatibility: Fits TV screens ranging from 40" to 75" with a maximum screen depth of 60 mm.
  • Weight Capacity: Sturdy support for screens weighing up to 45 kg.
  • Adjustable Height: Offers 5 height adjustment positions with a 200 mm range, providing flexibility for optimal viewing angles.
  • No Drilling Required: The stabilizing pad made of elastomer ensures secure positioning, making installation a breeze without the need for drills.
  • Anti-Fall Protection: Built-in anti-fall device ensures the safety of your mounted screen.
  • Customizable Finish: Can be painted with standard alkyd urethane paint to match your décor effortlessly.

Ideal for renters or anyone looking to avoid wall damage, the Acadia X-Large Fixed Height Wall Stand offers a sleek, secure, and versatile mounting solution for your home or office.

Product Name: Acadia Pro Wall Stand for 40"-90" TV
Description:
This No-Drill TV Wall Mount is the ultimate hassle-free solution for mounting large TVs without causing damage to your walls. Perfect for home, office, or rental spaces, this versatile mount supports 40"-90" screens, combining robust design with ease of installation.

Key Features:

  • Screen Compatibility: Designed for larger screens ranging from 40" to 90".
  • Heavy-Duty Steel Structure: The 5 mm steel frame securely holds TVs weighing up to 50 kg.
  • Height Adjustable: Features 5 adjustable positions within a 200 mm range, allowing you to find the perfect viewing height.
  • No Drilling Needed: The repositionable elastomer stabilizing pad ensures firm and secure installation without drilling, ideal for damage-free mounting.
  • Safety First: Equipped with an anti-fall device for added protection and security.
  • Customizable Finish: Can be painted to blend seamlessly with your interior décor.

For a secure, stylish, and damage-free TV mounting solution, the Acadia Pro Fixed Height Wall Stand offers an unparalleled option for large screens without the need for wall modifications.

Store your AV devices behind the screen with the player rack for STANDiT PRO™. This player storage device can be installed at any height of the STANDiT PRO™ to fit neatly behind the screen. Thanks to a screw system, you can slide the rack to access your AV devices without taking off the display, keeping downtime to a minimum. Can be installed at any height, with dimensions including 2 areas of 200mm width and 40mm depth.

Crafted with durability in mind, the column ensures stability and seamless integration with existing setups.

Why It Works

Heckler Credenza Neo – Modern AV Enclosure for Video Meeting Spaces
The Heckler Credenza Neo is a sleek, wall-mounted AV enclosure designed to enhance modern meeting spaces. Its minimalist design conceals video conferencing equipment, ensuring a clean and professional appearance while facilitating efficient installations.

Crafted from durable, acoustically absorbent Felt Right PET felt, the front panel is pinnable, RF-transparent, and made from 50% recycled plastic. It’s antimicrobial, Class A fire-rated, and available in 42 modern colours—offering not only environmental responsibility but also custom branding opportunities to match your organisation’s identity.

Modern Profile.

Mount Left or Mount Right.

Heckler Front Mountâ€™s symmetric design allows you to mount regardless if your door is to the right or left of the mullion.

Heckler Front Mountâ€™s open back maintains airflow to your iPad as it runs continuously at full screen brightness - to keep the iPad running cool for years on-end. All buttons and cameras remain functional and available. Use iOS Guided Access feature to lock buttons from unwanted use.

Room for Wired Networking

Product Name: Soundbar Mount for Heckler AV Cart
Description:
Great video meeting carts require great audio. Soundbars deliver great sound, but mounting them can be a challenge. Professionally mount the most popular soundbar and soundbar-shaped devices to Heckler AV Cart.

Soundbar mounting without the heartache.

There is no mounting standard for soundbars. But you already knew that. AV professionals like yourself have suffered in silence for years. To help, we've researched a wide array of the most popular soundbars to help ensure Soundbar Mount heals the pain. We bet your favorite soundbar's mounting points will align with Soundbar Mount. And we've included the M4, M5, and 1/4-20 soundbar-mounting hardware you'll likely need.

Mount high. Mount low.

Soundbars and soundbar-shaped speakerphones are useful in both meeting rooms and in open space. With Soundbar Mount, you can firmly mount your device above or below the display to transmit and record sound at the ideal height for the environment.

Create new possibilities when combined with Device Panel.

Use Soundbar Mount together with Device Panel to install soundbars high above the floor - great for standing meetings and classrooms.

Painless installation.

You can finally stop using the display's VESA holes and a wobbly mess of brackets to mount soundbars. With Soundbar Mount, within moments, your device is mounted to the rigid structure of Heckler AV Cart.

No need to hide your backside.

Form following function is a beautiful thing. When all of your favorite devices come together with our minimal and strong hardware, you'd be proud for people to witness your video meeting carts from all angles.

See, hear, and touch.

Video meeting carts built with the best displays, cameras, speakers, and microphones deserve excellent touch control. Use Control Panel to mount an iPad or Logitech Tap.

Description:

READY FOR A CLOSE-UP.

â€œAV cartsâ€ have earned their reputation for being unsightly and cumbersome. Not Heckler AV Cart. Weâ€™ve designed Heckler AV Cart to be sleek and strong from all angles.

THE MODERN WAY TO MOUNT YOUR DISPLAY.

Mount 55-inch, 65-inch, and 75-inch displays with VESA 400 mounting patterns directly to the vertical supports of Heckler AV Cart. This creates a clean, modern platform ready for todayâ€™s technology, and tomorrowâ€™s.

SAVE SPACE.

With our patented nesting design you can securely store your investment without sacrificing valuable floor space.

INFINITE POSSIBILITIES.

With your displays deployed on Heckler AV Cart Base Configuration, your workspace is now ready to adapt and connect for many years to come. With the entire collection of Heckler AV Cart accessories you can adapt each cart for video meetings, classrooms, all-hands meetings, stage presentations, and more. As technology rapidly advances over the years, your devices will change, but Heckler AV Cart will remain.

HASSLE-FREE ASSEMBLY.

We value your time. So weâ€™ve designed Heckler AV Cart to assemble quickly and without hassle.

BUILT LIKE A TANK.

If you think Heckler AV Cart looks over engineered - that's because it is. No cost-cutting accountants were involved in the development of this product. When deciding between thinner steel or thicker, we went thicker. When deciding between a few cheap spot welds and fully welded, seamless joints you know which direction we went. If you were looking for cheaply made AV Carts, let us help you find them.

ROLLS LIKE BUTTER.

A good caster is hard to find - and a great caster is worth talking about. Our large, four-inch diameter wheels are great for hard floors and carpet, reject debris, and are of the perfect softness to leave your floors unmarred. The swivel and wheel bearings are sealed for a silent roll. The tread guard prevents cord entanglement. And the brakes are easy to engage. We can go on and on about these things if you'd like us to.

READY TO SHIP (CHEAPLY).

From the start, we designed Heckler AV Cart to be easy and cheap to ship via common carrier such as DHL, FedEx, and UPS. No longer must your AV cart projects be spoiled by astronomical freight charges. For your mass implementations, we can ship up to ten Heckler AV Carts on a single skid - that's five to ten times more efficient than our competitors.

Don’t let the trend toward large displays complicate your deployments, the Heckler AV/TV Wall Structure supports 65-inch to 98-inch displays with a variety of VESA mounting patterns from 300mm to 900mm. The Heckler AV Wall Structure is engineered to transfer the weight of your equipment to the floor, not the wall. This eliminates the need to reinforce walls in preparation for video meeting system deployments. Your investment stays in your hardware, not leased office space.

Product Name: Dual Display Kit for Heckler AV Wall
Description:
Made for big displays

Comfortable video meetings require large displays. And dual displays help to provide a dedicated screen for shared content. But dual-mounting large displays can create all sorts of challenges. Our Dual Display Kits make it easy to support dual displays with the floor, not the wall.

Our standard Dual Display Kit supports dual 65 and Dual 75-inch displays. Dual Display Kit XL supports dual displays from 82 to 100-inches!

Made for easy installs

So you want to conventionally mount two large displays to the wall in your meeting room? Cool. Just coordinate your favorite structural engineer, electrician, IT staff, facility manager, permitting specialist, contractor, drywaller, and painter. Or, simply click the Add-to-cart button on this page.

Heckler AV Wall with Dual Display Kit eliminates the need to strengthen walls and create new power and network outlets - and be safely installed by one person, in a few minutes.

Made to align

With the turn of two adjustment screws, you can bring two large displays into perfect alignment. With the time you’ll save by mounting your dual displays with Heckler AV Wall, you could take your kids to Disney World.

Cable routing made easy

Heckler AV Wall Structure’s legs enable you to quickly and tool-less-ly route your displays’ power cables to pre-existing, standard-height outlets. And route your HDMI cables to your components conveniently mounted within Video Meeting Kit.

Made to build confidence

We’ve constructed the beams of Dual Display Kit like a tank. Each beam is constructed of heavy-duty 12-gauge steel. Each beam is safely secured and cantilevered atop Heckler AV Wall Structure, capable of transferring more than 300 pounds of display weight to the floor. Additionally, each beam is anchored to the wall for good measure.

Made for safe display installations

Your displays install to Dual Display Kit reliably and safely at many different heights. Our heavy-duty display rails are ready for a wide range of display sizes. And our hook-engagement solution prevents unintentional display removal.

Made for all of your future configurations

With a Heckler AV Wall Structure installed in your meeting spaces, you have the flexibility to configure each space for video meetings and collaboration. The Heckler AV Wall product family includes an ever-growing assortment of accessories like Video Meeting Kit, Dual Display Kit, and Controller Mount, in a variety of colors.

Product Name: Luminen 8" - Smart Control with Touch Screen, Gateway and Mini Server
Description:
Designed for space-conscious applications that demand performance, the Luminen 8″ smart control panel brings together touchscreen control, Android-based automation, and intelligent connectivity in a compact form. Ideal for retail, hospitality, or home installations, it includes advanced AI hardware, antimicrobial touch surfaces, and versatile mounting.

  • Projected capacitive touch with anti-microbial glass

  • Runs Android 13 with OTA firmware support

  • Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.0 enabled

  • Embedded NPU (2.3 TOPS) for local AI processing

  • PoE (IEEE 802.3af), RJ-45, RS-485, CAN Bus, USB

  • 5 MP front camera, stereo speakers, and mic

  • EU/US gang box mounting support for easy retrofits

  • NFC (13.56MHz)

  • Warranty: Two-year standard warranty.

Product Name: Qbic Luminen Pro 15" - PoE Room Booking Display with LED Status Lights
Description:
The Qbic Luminen Pro 15 is designed for high-visibility spaces like boardrooms, open-plan offices, and lecture halls. Featuring a 15.6” Full HD touchscreen with vibrant LED side lighting, this premium panel clearly displays real-time room status and booking information.

With a robust aluminium body, antimicrobial Corning® Gorilla® Glass, and silent fanless operation, the Luminen Pro 15 delivers both presence and practicality. Integrated PoE simplifies cabling, and the latest wireless connectivity (Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.2) ensures reliable performance across networks.

Compatible with Android 13 or Linux Yocto, the panel supports a wide range of room scheduling and signage platforms. Smart Control software allows remote monitoring and OTA updates, simplifying management for IT teams.

Technical Specifications

  • 15.6” IPS touchscreen (1920 × 1080 resolution)

  • Projected capacitive touchscreen technology

  • Android 13 (or Linux Yocto OS option)

  • Quad-core ARM Cortex-A55 processor

  • 4GB RAM / 16GB eMMC storage

  • RGB LED side lights (programmable)

  • PoE (IEEE 802.3af) and 12V DC power options

  • Wi-Fi 6 (802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/ax) and Bluetooth 5.2

  • Optional NFC reader and integrated PIR motion & ambient light sensors

  • Antimicrobial Corning® Gorilla® Glass

  • Supports Qbic Smart Control & remote OTA firmware updates

  • Fanless aluminium unibody

  • VESA 75 × 75 mounting (wall/glass)

  • Certifications: CE, FCC, RoHS, REACH, WEEE compliant

Product Name: Redpark Gigabit-PoE Adapter with Lightning Cable
Description:
Gigabit + PoE Adapter for iPad (L6-NETPOE) The Redpark Gigabit + PoE Adapter connects iPads and iPhones to ethernet and uses power over ethernet (PoE) to charge the device. This enables an iPad to receive both data and power over a single Ethernet cable when connected to a PoE-enabled switch or a PoE injector.

This iPad ethernet adapter is instantly recognized as a network connection. The ethernet connection is available for use by any iOS app and can be configured using the Settings app on the iPad when running iOS 10 (or later).The adapter physically connects to the iPad or iPhone using a Lightning to USB Micro B cable. It supports 10/100/1000 networking and provides bandwidth up to 225 Mbps. Warranty: 1 year Connectors: Ethernet: RJ45 Auto MDX iPad: USB Micro B (via L90-B Series cable)

Redpark – Simple PoE Power for Tablet Stands
Redpark PoE adapters provide reliable power and data to your tablet stands over a single Ethernet cable, so there’s no need for on-site electrical work. Perfect for fast, professional installations.

Product Name: Redpark Gigabit-PoE Adapter with Lightning Cable
Description:
Gigabit + PoE Adapter for iPad (L6-NETPOE) The Redpark Gigabit + PoE Adapter connects iPads and iPhones to ethernet and uses power over ethernet (PoE) to charge the device. This enables an iPad to receive both data and power over a single Ethernet cable when connected to a PoE-enabled switch or a PoE injector.

This iPad ethernet adapter is instantly recognized as a network connection. The Magewell Pro Capture Quad HDMI is a professional four-channel HDMI capture card for live production, streaming, and broadcast applications. It captures up to four HDMI sources simultaneously—each with embedded audio—through a PCIe Gen2 ×4 interface, supporting resolutions up to 2048 × 2160.

Hardware-based processing delivers ultra-low-latency performance and reliable 24/7 operation, with features such as de-interlacing, scaling, colour-space conversion, and multiple capture streams per input. Compatible with Windows, macOS, and Linux, it integrates seamlessly with popular software like OBS, vMix, and Wirecast.

Key Features

  • 4 × HDMI Type A inputs with embedded audio

  • PCIe Gen2 ×4 host interface

  • Up to 2048 × 2160 resolution support

  • Hardware processing: de-interlace, scaling, cropping, colour adjustment

  • Multiple simultaneous capture streams per input

  • Ultra-low-latency with hardware timestamping

  • Supports Windows, Linux, and macOS

  • Compatible with OBS, vMix, Wirecast, and more

  • 24/7 reliable operation with LED indicators and card ID switch

The Magewell Ultra Encode SDI Plus is a high-performance live streaming and recording encoder, engineered for professional broadcast, production, and AV-over-IP workflows. Supporting 3G-SDI input and flexible encoding options, it enables streaming to multiple platforms simultaneously with superior quality and reliability.

With support for H.264, H.265 (HEVC), and NDI® HX2/3 compression, the Ultra Encode SDI Plus delivers exceptional video quality while optimizing bandwidth usage. It streams effortlessly to platforms like YouTube, Facebook Live, and Twitch, and integrates easily into IP production environments. Its compact, robust design makes it ideal for portable production kits, lecture capture, live event streaming, and corporate communications.

  • Flexible 3G-SDI Input: Accepts signals up to 1080p60 for broadcast-quality encoding.

  • Dual Streaming Outputs: Stream to two destinations simultaneously via RTMP, SRT, RTSP, HLS, and more.

  • Advanced Compression: Supports H.264 and H.265 (HEVC) video encoding, with NDI® HX2 and HX3 output options.

  • Simultaneous Recording: Record high-quality MP4 files to an external USB storage device while streaming.

  • Low Latency Streaming: Optimised for minimal delay, ensuring real-time audience engagement.

  • Comprehensive Audio Support: Embedded SDI audio and external 3.5mm line-in/mic-in options.

  • Extensive Streaming Protocol Support: RTMP/RTMPS, SRT Caller/Listener/Publish, RTSP, HLS, and TS over UDP/RTP.

  • Simple Configuration: Intuitive web-based interface for easy setup and monitoring.

  • Compact and Portable: Durable, small-form factor design ideal for field use and space-restricted setups.

  • PoE Powered: Single-cable deployment with Power over Ethernet support for easy integration.

Perfect for churches, schools, corporate events, and field productions, the Magewell Ultra Encode SDI Plus enables organisations to live stream professional-quality video directly to their audiences, record content locally for later use, and integrate into modern IP-based video workflows — all with minimal setup and maximum reliability.

• Supports flexible input sources ranging from AV and IP streams to media files
  • Intuitive user interface and companion app for scene editing and creating shows
  • Rich output possibilities including RTMP and SRT streams, NDI_HX3 and local displays

Product Name: Pro Convert Audio DX - Bi-Directional Dante Audio Encoder/Decoder with Analog Stereo Input/Output
Description:
The Magewell Pro Convert Audio DX is a powerful Dante-enabled AV-over-IP audio converter, providing seamless bi-directional conversion between Dante, NDI®, and USB audio. Designed for professional AV workflows, it integrates audio sources into networked environments with low latency and exceptional quality.

Key Features:

  • Dante & NDI® Support: Enables high-quality audio-over-IP transmission for professional AV setups.
  • Bi-Directional Conversion: Seamlessly converts audio between Dante, USB, and analogue connections.
  • Flexible Connectivity: Features XLR, RCA, USB, and 3.5mm interfaces for diverse applications.
  • Low Latency Performance: Ensures real-time audio transmission with minimal delay.
  • Compact & Portable: Space-saving design for easy integration into any AV environment.

Applications:
Ideal for professional AV installations, live events, broadcast setups, and conferencing systems that require high-quality, networked audio solutions.

The AC-360-CM ceiling mount makes this solution more flexible than ever.

The MXL AC-360-Z-V2 is the result of decades of expertise developing studio-recording microphones. Twelve internal microphone capsules, divided into four quadrants, ensure 360 of perfect speech intelligibility within a 25-ft radius, without reliance on any additional equipment. This product works exclusively with the Zoom Rooms platform only. The solid, all-metal construction and reinforced frame provide extra durability for shared office environments.

MXL AC-370-U is a professional USB conference microphone engineered to deliver crystal-clear 360° audio coverage for today’s dynamic meeting spaces. Ideal for boardrooms, huddle rooms, and collaborative environments, it seamlessly integrates with leading platforms such as Microsoft Teams, Zoom, and Google Meet for reliable plug-and-play performance.

Key Features:

  • 360° Audio Coverage: Twelve integrated microphone capsules deliver natural, intelligible speech within a full 25-foot (7.5m) diameter for consistent sound across the entire meeting table.

  • Daisy-Chain Expansion: Effortlessly connect multiple units with included USB-C cables to cover any size room, making the system scalable for large conferencing setups.

  • Robust Construction: All-metal body with reinforced frame offers lasting durability and a professional appearance suitable for high-use commercial environments.

  • Flexible Installation: Designed for easy placement on tables or ceilings, with removable feet and all mounting hardware included for seamless setup in any space.

  • Plug-and-Play Simplicity: No drivers required—just connect via USB-C for instant compatibility with conferencing hardware and software.

With its advanced omnidirectional pickup, expansion capability, and effortless installation, the AC-370-U provides superior audio for meetings of any size, ensuring every participant is clearly heard. Perfect for hybrid workplaces and collaborative AV environments.

Product Name: Heavy-Duty Gas Spring Gaming Monitor Arm – 27″–50″ (18 kg)
Description:
The NB-A6 is a next-generation gas spring monitor arm engineered for users who need smooth, secure positioning for large, flat or curved monitors. Supporting screens from 27″ to 50″ and up to 18 kg, this all-metal arm delivers effortless adjustment for gaming, creative, and productivity workstations.

Built with a heavy-duty gas spring mechanism and finished in a matte charcoal coating, the NB-A6 combines industrial strength with a premium aesthetic. The arm offers full articulation—including tilt, swivel, rotation, height and reach—while built-in cable management ensures a tidy workspace.

  • Supports 27″–50″ Monitors – Perfect for ultrawide and curved displays

  • Heavy Load Capacity – Holds screens from 2 to 18 kg

  • Full Motion Adjustability – Tilt ±50°, Swivel ±90°, Rotation 360°

  • Extended Range – 640 mm arm extension, 285 mm vertical lift

  • Desk Mount Flexibility – Includes C-Clamp and Grommet options for 12–95 mm desktops

  • Neat and Tidy – Integrated cable management keeps wiring hidden

  • VESA Compatible – Fits 75 x 75 mm and 100 x 100 mm mounting patterns

Workstations, gaming setups, trading desks, and shared offices needing high-capacity ergonomic monitor support with a clean, modern finish.

Product Name: Heavy Duty Electric Lift TV Cart 75"-100" Screens
Description:

OIP-N40E is an HD device which encodes video to a range of popular streaming formats including the popular NDI HX3. Designed with an integrated tally light, the unit is ideal as a studio camera converter, transmitting a live feed with minimal latency to a software-based switcher such as vMix, OBS and Telestream Wirecast or a hardware decoder.

OIP-N60D is a 4K NDI HX, SRT, RTSP and RTMPS decoder which adds the ability to create high-resolution video walls, with screens arranged in landscape or portrait orientation. The decoder has the ability to clean switch between multiple sources using the web interface, giving users signal routing over the local area network.

Not only does OIP-N60D output video over HDMI, but it also supports UVC output over USB. This enables the decoder to convert NDI and IP video into a webcam stream for use with video conferencing platforms such as MS Teams, Zoom and Google Meet.

“These new converters are a true Swiss army knife solution, providing support for multiple IP formats. Their support for USB opens up so many new AV workflows and we can’t wait to see how our customers will use them.” Commented Steven Liang, VP of Product Development at Lumens.

Another key feature of the new OIP-N pair is the ability to extend a USB webcam. Traditionally, webcams were limited by the maximum length of a USB cable. Now, OIP-N60D can receive a webcam input, transmitting the signal over IP networks for conversion back to USB by OIP-N40E.

Product Name: 20x Zoom Document Camera with VGA/HDMI Input and Output - Black
Description:
Excellent Image Quality

Lumens PC193 captures documents and 3D objects for live HD display on projectors and monitors. Featuring VGA and HDMI outputs, the visualizer supports resolutions up-to 1080 and produces sharp, vivid, and bright images. With a built-in power adapter and onboard recording, PC193 can be used as a standalone document camera, without the need for a host computer or network connection.

Expandable Media Storage

The PC193's internal image store can be expanded using a USB flash drive up-to a maximum 4TB. Files stored locally can be played out to screens, or shared with colleagues for playback on any computer or smart device.  

Standalone Creativity

Most document cameras require a PC for annotation and live graphic overlay. By connecting a USB mouse to the unit, users have access to a range of drawing, highlighting and masking tools which will enhance any live presentation. 

Computer Integration

Connect PC193 to a PC via USB to enjoy even greater creativity. Lumens Ladibug software for PC and Mac brings advanced annotation tools to desktop computers. Users can add text, spotlight and erase regions of an image, and much more. Connecting the camera to a computer by USB also turns PC193 into a webcam, recognized by all major video conferencing software, such as Teams, Zoom, and Webex. The high-quality camera and in-built microphone combine to deliver a truly versatile collaborative communication tool.

Picture Perfect

With an adjustable lamp and the camera mounted on a flexible gooseneck, users can capture the image they want, without distracting reflections or uneven lighting. Once the camera and light are perfectly positioned, the one-click Auto-Tune button quickly adjusts the clarity, brightness, and color to produce great-looking pictures without any user input. 
  • 1080 output (30fps)  
  • Flexible gooseneck design 
  • VGA input/output, HDMI input/output 
  • Built-in microphone 
  • Internal recording with support for USB drive expansion 
  • Innovative built-in power supply

Product Name: 4K Desktop Document Camera with HDMI/VGA/USB and IP streaming
Description:
Superior Image Quality

With a 4K camera and powerful zoom, the PS753 delivers remarkably detailed images to screens and projectors.
The high-performance Sony sensor faithfully reproduces textures and colors in real-time, with excellent control over image noise.

Wide Shooting Area

Lumens PS753 is extremely versatile, capable of reproducing documents and objects larger than A3 in size (over 20.5" x 12.1" / 50cm x 30cm). This gives presenters and demonstrators the flexibility that less powerful visualizers cannot match. Where the operator needs a close-up shot, the 300x zoom can capture the finest detail. For maximum versatility, the ePTZ functionality changes the camera angle and position to focus on a specific part of the object. This gives you the precise image you need every time.

Multi-Angle Lighting

The Lumens PS753 has dual lights on adjustable gooseneck mounts: any object is perfectly lit from above without glare or reflections. It also has a backlit LED light under the display area, making the visualizer ready to illuminate photo negatives and X-rays from below.

Easy to Use

Despite its advanced features, Lumens PS753 is very easy to use. The Auto-Tune immediately calibrates the camera to deliver a perfectly focused image with accurate colors. The annotation tool allows the user to draw over the image on the screen without installing any additional software. It’s fast, convenient, and simple to use. Use the included Ladibug software for advanced image control and connect to remote guests using your favorite conferencing platforms, such as Zoom, Meet, Skype, Teams, or WebEx.

Fast Installation

The PS753 is very easy to install. Power is provided over your Ethernet network (PoE) without additional power supplies. The system can output live pictures over a connection that suits the way you work: it links directly to a display or projector over HDMI or VGA or streams images over your network.
  • 4K Resolution with 300x zoom
  • Supports HDMI, VGA, Ethernet, and USB output
  • Shooting area (20.5" x 12.1") larger than A3
  • Records to USB drives
  • HDMI pass-through up to 4K resolution
  • 5-year warranty

Product Name: PoE to USB-C Power Delivery and 10/100 Data Combined
Description:
Connect to USB-C PD Enabled Devices like iPad Mini 6, iPad 10th Gen, Samsung Tab S7 Lite, and more with both power and data. This rugged, affordable device converts normal, IEEE 802.3af PoE into USB-C power delivery (PD) and data with an integrated USB-C right angle cable. No accessories to buy, this device fits into almost any tablet enclosure and works with any PoE switch.
