Product Name: PoE+ to USB-C Power & Data In-Wall Converter – 25W (Designed for Amazon Echo Hub)
Description:
Deliver power and data to your USB-C device using a single Ethernet cable with this PoE+ to USB-C Power & Data Converter. Designed for clean, in-wall installations, it provides up to 25 W of USB-C Power Delivery along with 10/100 Mbps data — ideal for tablets, smart displays, and wall-mounted control interfaces. Purpose-built for the Amazon Echo Hub, while also compatible with other USB-C devices within the 25W power budget.

Total Output: Up to 25 W
Port: 1 × USB-C (Power + 10/100 Mbps data)
PoE Input: IEEE 802.3at PoE+ (48–57 V)
USB-C PD Profiles: 5 V 3.4 A / 9 V 3.3 A
Data Support: 10/100 Mbps
Mounting: Fits standard in-wall junction boxes
Protection: Over-voltage, over-current, short-circuit

Compatible with the Amazon Echo Hub, as well as USB-C tablets, smart controllers, and low-power displays requiring up to 25 W.

Ideal for smart home hubs, digital signage, kiosks, and any installation needing reliable power and data through a single PoE+ cable in a tidy, concealed setup.

Product Name: POE+ to USB-C Power + Data with USB-A Port
Description:
Power your tablet and accessories from a single Ethernet cable with the AT-USBC-A-PD PoE+ to USB-C & USB-A Converter, providing reliable USB-C Power Delivery and USB-A output using an IEEE 802.3at PoE+ input. Designed for clean, compact installations, it delivers stable power and data without the need for separate power adapters.

Total Output: Up to 25 W shared
Ports: 1 × USB-C PD 3.0 + 1 × USB-A (5 V)
PoE Input: IEEE 802.3at PoE+ (48–56 V)
USB-C PD Profiles: 5 V 2.6 A, 9 V 1.78 A, 12 V 1.34 A, 15 V 1.37 A, 20 V 1.15 A
USB-A Output: 5 V up to 1 A
Smart Power Distribution: Automatically allocates power between USB-C and USB-A
Data Support: USB-C data + 10/100/1000 Mbps Gigabit Ethernet input
Protection: Over-current, over-voltage, and short-circuit
Mounting: Wall or DIN-rail compatible

Compatible with iPad Pro, Samsung Galaxy Tab, Surface Go, Google Pixel tablets, and low-power USB-A peripherals such as card readers and storage devices.

Ideal for kiosks, POS systems, check-in stations, and digital signage, this PoE-powered converter creates a clean, cable-efficient setup while delivering dependable power and data through a single network run.

Product Name: Lightning to Ethernet Adaptor 25 Watt Output Compatible with IEEE 802.3at Switch or Injector
Description:
IN-WALL USB TYPE C POWER + DATA DELIVERY WITH 25-WATT OUTPUT

Perfect for mounted tablets in office or commercial spaces, this PoE to USB type C adapter is designed to fit inside the US or European junction box for mounted tablet enclosures. You can now have a PoE+ to USB Type C Power and Data Delivery solution specific for Apple iPad!

25 Watt 802.3at PoE to USB-C Output.

Two unique outputs allow you to deliver either USB-C power PLUS 10/100 Mbps data directly to your tablet OR power the only solution for tablets connected to Wi-Fi.

For consistent performance, be sure to use a high-quality USB cable.

Low-quality USB cables (including some Apple cables) are inconsistent. Below are links to different length cables we sell and guarantee.

 Product Details

  • Delivers both continuous USB-C power and Data to your tablet on the USB-C connector. PoE technology allows you to extend power and data up to 328 feet from the source.
  • Offers a working solution for installing tablets, kiosks, and schedulers where you need them using PoE technology
  • Fits inside the standard US and European Junction Box
  • Delivers Both USB Type C Power and 10/100 Fast Ethernet Data on one cable
  • Wired 10/100 Mbps data through the connector allows for greater network security.
  • Plug-and-play design for easy installation
  • 2.0 USB Data Standard Output
  • 25 Watt Output - (5V2.6A, 9V1.78A, 12V1.34A,15V1.37A, 20V1.15A)
  • Compatible with IEEE 802.3at PoE+ Switch or Injector

* Samsung Tab compatibility may vary. 2020 Tab A7 SMT500 models no longer have the ability to do concurrent power and data connections, though SMT510 and SMT515 still do have compatibility. Please check your specific model for compatibility with USB-C data transfer.

Product Name: Gigabit PoE++ (802.3bt) to USB-C Power + Data Delivery with 65 Watt Output with USB-C cable - USB-C compatible with Laptops, iPad Pro 12.9", Surface Go, Galaxy Tab
Description:
GBT-USBC-PD-USBC – PoE++ to USB-C Power & Data Converter

The GBT-USBC-PD-USBC is a high-performance Power over Ethernet (PoE++) to USB-C converter designed to deliver both power and data over a single Ethernet cable. Ideal for deploying USB-C devices such as tablets, laptops, and peripherals in environments where traditional power outlets are unavailable, this converter simplifies installations by combining power delivery and data transmission into one streamlined solution.

  • Simultaneous Power and Data: Provides up to 65W of power alongside Gigabit Ethernet connectivity over a single cable.

  • Wide Device Compatibility: Supports a range of USB-C devices, including iPad Pro, Microsoft Surface, Samsung Galaxy Tab, and various laptops.

  • Plug-and-Play Installation: No additional configuration required; simply connect to a compatible PoE++ source and your USB-C device.

  • Compact and Durable Design: Sleek metallic casing enhances heat dissipation and is suitable for various installation environments.

  • LED Indicators: Visual feedback for power and connectivity status with green/red (PoE) and yellow/green (Link) LEDs.

  • Model: GBT-USBC-PD-USBC

  • Input: IEEE 802.3bt PoE++ (48-56V)

  • Output: USB-C with Power Delivery up to 65W

  • Data Rate: 10/100/1000 Mbps

  • Operating Temperature: -10 to 60°C

  • Mounting Options: Wall or inline installation

  • Dimensions: Compact form factor for versatile placement

Note: Compatible with a variety of USB-C devices; ensure device compatibility with USB-C power delivery and data transfer standards.

The Redpark USB-C Gigabit + PoE Adapter is the first ethernet + PoE adapter designed specifically for USB-C iPads. The adapter connects USB-C iPads to ethernet and uses power over ethernet (PoE+) to charge the iPad. This enables an iPad to receive both data and power over a single Ethernet cable when connected to a PoE+ enabled switch or a PoE+ injector.

When connected to an iPad the adapter is instantly recognized as a network connection. The ethernet connection can be configured using the Settings app on the iPad.

The adapter physically connects to the iPad using a USB-C to USB-C cable (sold separately). It supports 10/100/1000 networking and provides bandwidth up to 900Mbps.

Specifications

PoE+ adaptors require PoE+ (802.3at) or PoE++ (802.3bt) power from switches since they need minimum 30W

Ethernet
10/100/1000
RJ45 Auto MDX connector

Power Over Ethernet
PoE+ (802.3at) powered device
Power consumption: 30W

iOS
For use with all iOS devices with USB-C connector
Requires iOS 16.5 or later

USB Connection to iPad
Provides 3A 5V to the iPad as required in Apple specifications
Connector: USB-C
Use a Redpark USB-C cable or an Apple USB-IF certified USB-C cable

Environmental
Temperature Range: 0C – 55C

Now with an optional Hollow Wall & Steel Frame Mounting Kit accessory, this stand adapts to every installation environment — from traditional timber studs to steel frames and gib walls.

Key Features:

  • Supports displays up to 86" with a maximum weight capacity of 200 lb (90.7 kg)
  • Motorised lift with a centre-of-screen travel range from 863.8 mm (34.01") to 1513.8 mm (59.6")
  • Integrated 2RU internal racking for secure AV and IT equipment storage
  • Optional Hollow Wall & Steel Frame Mounting Kit (SD-FPSA/WHDF) enables safe, code-compliant installation on drywall, steel studs, or timber framing
  • Concealed cable management for a clean, professional appearance

Designed for meeting rooms, classrooms, digital signage, and collaborative workspaces, it delivers performance, safety, and flexible, professional display mounting.

Product Name: Electric Lift, Mobile Stand for 50inch Surface Hub 2S & 3
Description:
Salamander Electric Lift Small Mobile Cart

The Salamander Electric Lift Small Mobile Cart combines functionality and mobility in one powerful solution. Designed for seamless integration with the Microsoft Surface Hub 2S & 3S 50", the cart allows you to unlock the true potential of your collaboration spaces.

Certified by Microsoft, its small size makes it easily compact and portable, minimizing space and ensuring total efficiency. With Salamander's precision ergonomics, you can optimize your viewing angles, enhancing engagement and productivity during meetings and brainstorming sessions.

It also allows you to effortlessly transition from focused productivity to collaborative presentations by raising the interactive display. For a great way to enhance your presentations, browse our range today.

Collaborate with Your Team with the Salamander Electric Lift Small Mobile Cart

Take control of your creative, presentation, and collaboration workspaces with this heavy-duty mobile stand. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, this cart ensures flexibility and extreme durability, enabling you to create a workspace that adapts to your needs.

Features include:

  • Integrates seamlessly with Microsoft Surface Hub 2S & 3S 50”
  • Small, compact size – easy to transport and manoeuvre
  • Motorized electric lift
  • Durable heavy-duty construction

Elevate Productivity and Durability with Salamander's Precision Ergonomics

Salamander is renowned for producing highly functional workplace solutions that enhance the way you do business. The small mobile cart features an electric lift, making it easy for you to customize the height of your display for an optimal viewing experience.

This, in turn, will elevate your team’s collaboration and productivity, with everyone being able to share ideas and get on the same page.

Require further tips or assistance? Get in touch with our knowledgeable staff today. We’re always on hand to assist in finding the right solution for your business needs.

Product Name: Electric Lift Wall Stand for 50inch Surface Hub 2S & 3
Description:
Salamander Electric Lift Wall Stand for Surface Hub 2S & 3S 50 

Introducing the Salamander Electric Lift Wall Stand for Surface Hub 2S 50, a game-changing solution that takes your collaboration to new heights.

Fully authorized and certified by Microsoft, this stand is the ideal choice for your Surface Hub 2S & 3S 50. 

Elevate Your Presentations with Salamander Wall Stand 

With the Salamander Wall Stand, collaboration is made much more seamless. Whether you're conducting meetings, brainstorming sessions, or delivering presentations, this stand ensures that everyone can actively engage and contribute.

Features include:

  • Designed to integrate with Surface Hub 2S & 3S
  • ADA-compliant
  • Precision ergonomics for complete versatility
  • Ability to customize for either a fixed or adjustable height

Our precision ergonomics are designed to maximize productivity, flexibility, and collaboration. The stand allows you to position your Surface Hub 2S & 3S 50 at the perfect height, providing an optimal viewing angle for all participants.

Here at Leading Solutions, we provide a wide range of innovative AV hardware solutions that are designed to transform the way your team works together. Need something you can’t see here? Get in touch with us today – our team is always on hand to assist you.
Fully height adjustable, integrated camera and controller shelf above or below screen.

Deploy a truly mobile meeting experience with this fully integrated Surface Hub 2S Battery Storage Case. This ensures that the APC™ battery stays 100% secure as you move the Surface Hub 2S about to accommodate today’s needs and flex spaces. This cover is constructed with the finest quality, laser cut steel and includes a durable steel locking mechanism to ensure long-lasting, secure battery storage.

  • Secures APC™ Mobile Battery (not included) to Salamander Designs FPS Electric Lift and Fixed Height Stands
  • Enables additional component storage below battery thanks to a slim design
  • Ensures long-lasting durability with premium, laser cut steel construction
  • Charge battery and operate stand with minimal effort by adding our standard cable reel accessory
  • Product Dimensions 16.2″ W (411 mm) x 24.16″ H (614mm) x 3.76″ D (95mm)
  • Enjoy total peace of mind with our Lifetime Limited Warranty
  • Not compatible with the following accessories; Keyboard Shelf, 3U or 5U Racks or Storage Covers

Product Name: Electric Lift Wall Stand Self-Support Mounting Kit
Description:
Electric Lift Wall Stand Self-Support Mounting Kit

Install your Salamander Electric Lift Wall Stand safely and securely - even without timber studs or masonry. This mounting kit enables reliable installation into gib/drywall and steel frame and metal stud walls by distributing load through heavy-duty steel foot plates and high-strength hollow wall anchors.

Engineered for safety and performance, it ensures screen stability in meeting rooms, classrooms, and commercial environments where traditional wall structures aren’t available.

Key Features

  • Enables secure installation into hollow or steel frame walls with metal studs
  • Heavy-duty steel foot plates for superior load distribution
  • Compatible hollow wall anchors included
  • Maintains structural safety and compliance

Mounting Kit Only. Compatibility: Salamander Wall Stand models SD-FPS1W/EL/GG/EX

Product Name: Collaboration Table with TV Mount and AV Cabinet
Description:
The Salamander Unifi Huddle™ is a premium meeting table designed for modern offices and small group collaboration (2-5 people). Its boat-shaped tabletop optimises camera angles for video conferencing, while its sleek design combines functionality with style. The table includes under-table storage for seamless cable management and is built with a durable aluminium chassis that features a modesty panel, wire management, and ADA compliance for accessibility.

  • Only 1 available – Act fast to secure this premium furniture at a heavily reduced price!
  • Pre-Assembled & Free-Standing: No wall mounting or screwing required. Simply position and use – ideal for flexible office setups.
  • Built-In Equipment Rack: Features a 3RU vertical rack inside the cabinet with adjustable tray shelves, providing secure and organised storage for AV equipment, media devices, or networking hardware.
  • Accommodates Large Screens: Designed for displays up to 65 inches (diagonal), making it perfect for impactful presentations and video conferencing.
  • Integrated Power Solution: Features a convenient pop-up power box; however, please note it is fitted with USA plugs. Adapters may be required.
  • Condition: Box opened for inspection, but the product is unused and in excellent condition.

This sleek and functional table combines modern design with practicality, making it a perfect fit for offices, co-working spaces, or home studios. Don’t miss this opportunity to upgrade your workspace at a fraction of the cost.

This versatile table fosters collaboration in the workplace while serving as an impressive tool for client presentations. Its sleek, modern design encourages creativity, interaction, and professional engagement, making it the perfect solution for both team collaboration and impactful presentations.

Key Features:

  • Capacity: Comfortably accommodates 2-3 people with seating and desk space for client presentations.
  • Height: Cafe-height design ideal for casual discussions or formal client presentations.
  • Screen Size Compatibility: Supports 43" - 55" screens for various AV setups, perfect for showcasing presentations and virtual demos to clients.
  • Cable Management: Under-table storage base for easy access and organization of cables, maintaining a tidy, professional look.
  • Future-Proof Design: Easily upgrade technology as needed to stay ahead of evolving presentation tools and impress clients with modern features.
  • Low-Impact Installation: Quick to deploy and easy to move, perfect for dynamic office spaces.
  • Space-Saving Design: Maximize your space with a sleek, compact footprint that enhances workplace collaboration while saving valuable room in client presentation areas.

Whether you're hosting team discussions or presenting to clients, the Salamander Unifi Huddle Table delivers innovation, ease of use, and modern design to elevate any setting while efficiently using your space.

Fort Knox iPad & Keyboard Guard

Protect valuable Apple devices with the next generation of retail security. The Shopguard Fort Knox iPad & Keyboard Guard is meticulously engineered for a precision fit with specific iPad models, delivering uncompromising physical protection and robust anti-theft assurance for both tablets and attached keyboards. 

Key Features:

  • Heavy-duty, cut-resistant enclosure with secure cross-strap and keyed lock for maximum device and accessory protection.

  • Accommodates attached Apple keyboards or equivalent slim-profile accessories.

  • Maintains charging, button, and camera access for in-store demo or kiosk use.

  • Discreet, tamper-evident design deters theft while enabling full device interaction.

  • Quick-release for staff with unique Shopguard key system.

Recommended for retail, education, government, and any high-risk public display of current iPad models that demand the strongest physical security with a tailored fit.

For more details or to confirm model compatibility, please contact Leading Solutions.

The X-Label Wall Mount is a precision-engineered solution designed to securely house Brother QL-810W, QL-820NWB, and QL-820NWBc label printers. Its sleek enclosure conceals printer controls for a clean, professional appearance, while allowing easy access for label roll replacements. Ideal for environments where space is at a premium, this mount facilitates efficient badge and visitor pass printing directly from the wall.

  • Space-Efficient Design – Maximizes workspace by mounting the printer vertically.

  • Concealed Cabling – Accommodates and hides power and optional data cables.

  • Easy Label Retrieval – Printed labels rest neatly in the printer mouth for quick access.

  • Durable Construction – Robust build ensures long-term stability and reliability.

  • Dimensions: 230 mm (W) x 160 mm (D) x 160 mm (H)

  • Weight: 1.5 kg

  • Material: High-quality metal with matte black finish

  • Compatibility: Brother QL-810W, QL-820NWB, QL-820NWBc

Note: Label printer not included.

Product Name: 25cm USB-C Extension Cable 2.0 (Charging Only - Not Data)

Description: PivotTable melds the worlds of flexibility, functionality, and security. Utilizing a non-slip foam layer, PivotTable allows you to mount your Windfall to just about any surface. Use the included double-sided adhesive disc to secure it down to your countertop, or the single-sided adhesive to allow the Stand to move freely. Pair it with a Kensington security cable, and your POS system is functional and secure.

PivotTack, the ultimate security accessory for your Heckler Windfall prime Stand. Designed for more permanent installations in your home or business, this accessory requires a small hole to be drilled in your countertop or table. The result gives you a clean, secure, and functional mounting system. Let PivotTacks groove guide your devices charging cable through your countertop or table. Complete the accessory with a 1/4 shank padlock beneath the surface, and your Windfall and power cable won't go anywhere without you knowing.

Product Name: PoE Texas PoE to USB-C Power and Data Adapter
Description:
Upgrade your device setup with the IEEE 802.3af PoE to USB-C Power & Data Adapter, a streamlined solution for delivering both power and data over a single Ethernet cable. Designed for compatibility with PoE networks, this adapter provides a stable 5V USB-C power supply while enabling reliable wired data transfer—ideal for tablets, kiosks, meeting room controllers, and other USB-C devices.

  • Power & Data in One – Converts PoE (Power over Ethernet) to USB-C for both charging and network connectivity.
  • Stable, Wired Connection – Eliminates Wi-Fi interruptions for uninterrupted performance in professional settings.
  • Versatile Compatibility – Works with a range of USB-C devices, including tablets and interactive displays.

Simplify your device management with a single-cable solution that ensures consistent power and data connectivity.

Product Name: Qbic 10.1" Smart Panel PC, Full HD IPS Display
Description: The TD-1060 Slim is versatile with the option of mounting the device on just about any surface. Additionally, with the option of a multi-angle countertop stand, the TD-1060 Slim offers users the freedom of integrating the smart panel PC into any scenario. This enterprise-grade product supports 10-point multi-touch with Active Shielding Technology, which ensures accurate contact even with wet fingers. Armed with Qbic's hardened OS features, the TD-1060 Slim is free from malware, security breaches, and data leaks , and is designed for both landscape and portrait installation .

Product Name: 10.1" Smart Panel PC, Full HD IPS Display, NFC/RFID AI-Ready
Description:
TD-1070 is the most Robust and Durable Panel PC in the market. Qbic incorporates aerospace-grade metallic material into the meeting room scheduling market, simply translates to premium quality. The TD-1070 comes with NFC & RFID embedded and can connect via PoE to avoid unstable Wi-Fi conditions.

The TD-1070’s Corning Gorilla Glass display is a revolutionary technology that is perfect for space management. Its antimicrobial properties provide users with a hygienic and safe surface.

Step into the future with the TD-1070, featuring a built-in AI-ready processor that revolutionizes the way we interact with our space. The Neural Processing Unit takes center stage, empowering the TD-1070 with voice and image recognition capabilities that optimize both customer and employee experiences. Say goodbye to clunky interfaces and hello to a seamless and intelligent experience.

Introducing Tab Secure, the ultimate desk-mounted solution designed to offer peace of mind and unmatched functionality for your iPad or tablet.

With Tab Secure, you can securely mount any iPad or tablet to your desk, ensuring it stays exactly where you need it, when you need it. Our screw-to-counter design adds an extra layer of security, so you can trust that your device is safe and stable, even in high-traffic environments.

But security isn't the only thing Tab Secure has to offer. Our secure tilting display allows for seamless interaction from both staff and customers, while the adjustable viewing angle ensures glare reduction and an optimal user experience.

Say goodbye to cable chaos with Tab Secure's internal cable routing system, which not only protects but also manages cables for a clutter-free workspace. And with the ability to mount your device in both landscape and portrait modes, you have the flexibility to adapt to any task or preference.

Plus, with the exposed home button and front camera, accessing key features and functionalities is a breeze.

Experience the perfect combination of security, versatility, and convenience with Tab Secure.

With Tab Secure, you can securely mount any iPad or tablet to your desk, ensuring it stays exactly where you need it, when you need it. Our screw-to-counter design adds an extra layer of security, so you can trust that your device is safe and stable, even in high-traffic environments.

But security isn't the only thing Tab Secure has to offer. Our secure tilting display allows for seamless interaction from both staff and customers, while the adjustable viewing angle ensures glare reduction and an optimal user experience.

Say goodbye to cable chaos with Tab Secure's internal cable routing system, which not only protects but also manages cables for a clutter-free workspace. And with the ability to mount your device in both landscape and portrait modes, you have the flexibility to adapt to any task or preference.

Plus, with the exposed home button and front camera, accessing key features and functionalities is a breeze.

Product Name: Tab Secure Desk Rotating Base - Samsung
Description:
Tab Secure Desk with Rotating Base Secure your tablet in style with the Tab Secure Tablet stands. This desk mounted solution allows you to mount any tablet on any surface. Help your customers to help themselves when things get busy; put your tablets to work as an engaging tool and let it interact with your clients. Internal specific tablet fitting kit Can be mounted in landscape or portrait mode Tamper proof tubular lock with 2 keys Kensington lock point for optional extended security Radio-transparent chassis for Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, 3/4G, and NFC Available in Black and White

Secure Enclosure

Each enclosure is secured together by a high quality key and barrel.

Ground Support

Built from strong high grade aluminium alloy to support and secure your tablet.

Future Proofing

Easily accommodate new tablet models by replacing the old blue rubber kits (and acrylic faceplate).

Total Control

Tab Secure stands can be mounted any way you want. Whether it'd be Desk, Wall or Free standing we make it adaptable to your application. The simple, solid design looks modern and stylish while conveying a clear message to would-be thieves.
Downloadable Content
Instruction Guide

This wall-mounted iPad holder allows you to mount your iPad for a range of business applications. The secure tilting display is perfect for interaction, whether you need to display information, streamline operations, or engage customers, this mount offers the perfect solution.

Key Features:

  • Portrait or Landscape Orientation: Option to mount portrait or landscape orientation to suit your display needs.
  • Exposed Camera and Home Button: With the exposed home button and front camera, accessing key features and functionalities is a breeze.
  • Internal Cable Routing: Keep cables secure and organized with internal routing, ensuring your iPad stays connected to power at all times.
  • Enhanced Security: Securely mount your iPad to the wall, preventing unauthorized removal or tampering.
  • Versatile Applications: Ideal for various settings including retail stores, restaurants, offices, lobbies, and more.

Product Name: USB 3.1 USB-C to USB-C (6.3mm OD) C Male Straight to C Male Straight - 5m
Description:
The Newnex USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C Cable is designed for high-speed data transfer, DisplayPort Alt Mode support, and reliable power delivery, making it ideal for professional and industrial applications. This 5-metre cable features a rugged build and a coaxial structure for enhanced signal integrity, allowing data rates up to 10Gbps and supporting 8K video resolution at 60Hz.

Key Features:

  • Data Rate: USB 3.2 Gen 2 up to 10Gbps.
  • Video Support: DP Alt Mode, up to 8K@60Hz.
  • Power Delivery: USB PD with E-marker, up to 20V/5A.
  • Durability: Reinforced for extended flex life and industrial use.

Applications:
Perfect for AV setups, high-speed data transfer, and extended USB-C connections in demanding environments.

Product Name: Active USB 3.2 USB-A to USB-C Cable USB 3.2 Gen 2x1, 10Gbps, A to C
Description:
This USB 3.2 Active Repeater Cable extends USB-A to USB-C connections over distances of 5 or 8 metres, offering high-speed data transfer up to 10Gbps. Ideal for professional applications, it supports power delivery, maintaining reliable performance over long distances without signal degradation.

Key Features:

  • Data Rate: USB 3.2 up to 10Gbps.
  • Length Options: Available in 5m and 8m lengths.
  • Durable Build: Engineered for extended reach with stable data transmission.

Applications:
Perfect for extended USB-C connections in professional AV, data, and industrial settings.

Product Name: 15m C-C USB 3.1 - 10Gbps - PD 30w - 6.4mm OD - C Male to C Male
Description:
This unidirectional USB-C Active Cable offers high-speed 10Gbps data transfer, DisplayPort with 2-lane support, and power delivery up to 60W. Available in 8m and 15m lengths, it is designed for extended connections in professional AV and data environments, maintaining signal quality over longer distances.

Key Features:

  • Data Rate: USB 3.2 Gen 2, up to 10Gbps.
  • Display Support: 2-lane DisplayPort for clear video output.
  • Power Delivery: Up to 60W (20V/3A).

Applications:
Ideal for AV, video conferencing, and extended USB-C setups in professional spaces.

Product Name: 8m C-C USB 3.1 - 10Gbps - PD 60w - 6.4mm OD - C Male to C Male
Description:
The FireNEX™-uLINK 10G is a high-speed USB-C extension cable designed for reliable, high-performance data transfer and power delivery. With support for USB 3.1 Gen 2 speeds up to 10Gbps, this cable is perfect for demanding applications requiring fast, stable connections. Its durable build includes TPE black jacket material and connectors designed to maintain robust performance in various environments. FireNEX-uLINK-10G USB-C to USB-C Multi-function Active Cable USB 3.1 Gen 2 10Gbps, DisplayPort 1.4, and 60W PD

Key Features:

  • High-Speed Data Transfer: Supports USB 3.1 Gen 2 speeds up to 10Gbps.
  • Display Support: Up to 4K@60Hz resolution.
  • Power Delivery: USB PD 3.0 with voltage profiles up to 20V and 3A.
  • Durability: TPE jacket for reliability in diverse settings.

Applications:
Ideal for professional environments requiring extended USB-C connectivity with high-speed data, video, and power delivery capabilities.

Product Name: USB-C Active Extension Cable USB 3.1 Gen 2 10Gbps, DisplayPort 1.4, and 60W PD
Description:
This USB-C Active Extension Cable offers a 4-metre solution for extending USB 3.2 connections with high-speed 10Gbps data transfer and DisplayPort Alt Mode support. Designed for performance, it enables video output up to 4K and power delivery, making it ideal for professional AV and data setups.

Key Features:

  • Data Transfer: USB 3.2, up to 10Gbps.
  • Video Support: DisplayPort Alt Mode up to 4K resolution.
  • Power Delivery: Supports up to 60W (20V/3A).

Applications:
Suitable for high-demand setups requiring extended USB-C connections with both video and power capabilities.

Product Name: 4K Dual Lens Speaker Tracking PTZ Camera
Description:
The VC-TR60A is a Teams Certified dual-lens speaker tracking camera that delivers ultra-sharp 4K video and crystal-clear audio. Perfect for hybrid meetings, conference rooms, and collaboration spaces, it ensures every participant is seen and heard with professional clarity.

Key Features:

  • Teams Certified: Fully certified for Microsoft Teams for seamless integration and reliable performance.

  • Dual-Lens Tracking: Automatically focuses on the active speaker while maintaining a wide room view.

  • 4K Ultra HD Video: High-resolution capture for stunning detail and lifelike images.

  • Intelligent Audio Capture: Crystal-clear sound with automatic speaker tracking and noise suppression.

  • Flexible Connectivity: Supports HDMI and IP input/output for versatile AV setups.

  • Streaming Protocols: Compatible with RTMP, RTMPS, MPEG-TS, TCP, and UDP for easy live streaming.

  • Control Integration: Full Panopto support and Crestron control for professional AV management.

  • Recording Options: On-board storage with network storage support, recording at 1080p 60/30fps.

With its Teams Certification, dual-lens tracking, and professional-grade video and audio, the VC-TR60A is a reliable solution for modern hybrid meetings, lectures, and live streaming events.
